recommendation.treatment: Apply liquid high-nitrogen fertilizer (e.g., 20-5-5) and provide deep, consistent watering.
recommendation.recovery: Test soil for organic content. Restore watering schedule. New growth should appear dark green within a week.
recommendation.prevention: Use slow-release fertilizer at planting. Apply mulch to retain soil moisture.

recommendation.treatment: Apply a fungicide containing Chlorothalonil or Mancozeb. Reapply every 7-10 days.
recommendation.recovery: Remove and dispose of infected leaves and debris immediately to slow spread.
recommendation.prevention: Ensure good air circulation. Water at the base of the plant, not the leaves.

recommendation.treatment: No effective chemical treatment for soil-borne Fusarium. Remove and destroy the infected plant and surrounding soil.
recommendation.recovery: Sanitize tools. Do not plant susceptible crops in this area for 4-6 years.

recommendation.treatment: Apply Neem oil or an insecticidal soap, targeting the underside of leaves.
recommendation.recovery: Spray heavily with water to dislodge mites. Repeat applications every 5-7 days.
recommendation.prevention: Maintain adequate humidity. Check plants frequently, especially in hot, dry weather.

recommendation.treatment: Spray wettable sulfur or potassium bicarbonate solution. Ensure coverage on leaf undersides.
recommendation.recovery: Prune overcrowded foliage to increase airflow.
recommendation.prevention: Avoid overhead watering. Plant resistant varieties.

questions.leaves_yellow_lower: Are older, lower leaves turning yellow?
questions.leaves_yellow_upper: Is new growth at the top turning yellow, but veins remain green?
questions.leaves_brown_lower: Are lower leaves turning brown, often with concentric rings?
questions.leaves_curling: Are leaves curling or rolling upwards at the edges?
questions.stem_weak: Does the plant stem appear weak or excessively thin?
questions.spots_powdery_white: Are there powdery white or gray spots on leaves or stems?
questions.new_growth_stunted: Is the new growth at the top of the plant small or pale?
questions.stems_cracked: Are there deep cracks or lesions near the base of the stem?
questions.vascular_discoloration: If the stem is cut, is the internal tissue (vascular ring) brown or discolored?
questions.leaves_wilting_day: Do leaves wilt during the hottest part of the day?
questions.soil_dry: Is the soil consistently dry, several inches deep?
questions.leaves_stippled: Are the leaves marked with tiny white or yellow pinprick spots (stippling)?
questions.webbing_under_leaves: Is fine, silky webbing visible on the underside of leaves or between leaf junctures?
questions.spots_concentric_rings: Do the spots have dark centers surrounded by lighter rings (like a target)?
questions.veins_green: Do the veins remain bright green while the surrounding tissue is yellow (chlorosis)?
